member.name: T:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController
member.summary: RESTful API controller for managing health logs. This is a minimal implementation with in-memory storage for demonstration purposes.

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController.GetAll
member.summary: Get all health logs
member.response: Returns the list of health logs

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a specific health log by ID
member.response: If the health log is not found

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController.Create(HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto)
member.summary: Create a new health log entry
member.response: Returns the newly created health log

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController.Update(System.Guid,HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto)
member.summary: Update an existing health log
member.response: If the health log is not found

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Controllers.HealthLogsController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete a health log
member.response: If the health log was successfully deleted
If the health log is not found

member.name: T:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for creating a new health log entry

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user for this health log

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto.Date
member.summary: Date of the health measurements

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto.BloodPressure
member.summary: Blood pressure reading (e.g., "120/80")

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto.HeartRate
member.summary: Heart rate in beats per minute (optional)

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.CreateHealthLogDto.Note
member.summary: Optional note about health status

member.name: T:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.HealthLogResponseDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for health log responses

member.name: M:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.HealthLogResponseDto.FromEntity(HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog)
member.summary: Maps a HealthLog entity to a response DTO

member.name: T:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing health log. All fields are optional to support partial updates.

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto.Date
member.summary: Updated date

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto.BloodPressure
member.summary: Updated blood pressure reading

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto.HeartRate
member.summary: Updated heart rate

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.DTOs.UpdateHealthLogDto.Note
member.summary: Updated note

member.name: T:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog
member.summary: Represents a basic health log entry in the system. This is a simple domain entity for storing health measurements.

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the health log

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user (elderly person) who this health log belongs to

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.Date
member.summary: Date when the health measurements were taken

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.BloodPressure
member.summary: Blood pressure reading (e.g., "120/80")

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.HeartRate
member.summary: Heart rate in beats per minute (optional)

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.Note
member.summary: Optional note about the health status or observations

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the health log was created

member.name: P:HealthTrackingService.Models.HealthLog.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the health log was last updated
